title: Ukraine says Russian forces are attacking Mariupol steel plant with civilians inside
content:
1. Ukraine says Russian forces are attacking Mariupol steel plant with civilians inside  NPR
  2. Ukraine reports Russians trying to storm Mariupol plant  Yahoo News
  3. Zelenskyy Insists Russia Does Not Control Mariupol, After Putin Declared Victory  NBC News
  4. Opinion | Putin has one last cruelty in mind for a devastated Mariupol  The Washington Post
  5. Chechen unit fighting with Russia stands before a burning building and claims it has "cleansed and destroyed" Mariupol.  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ウクライナ、ロシア軍が民間人がいるマリウポリ製鉄所を攻撃していると発表
乌克兰称俄罗斯军队正在袭击马里乌波尔钢铁厂，厂内有平民。
烏克蘭稱俄羅斯軍隊正在襲擊馬裏烏波爾鋼鐵廠，廠內有平民。
